data.question: What is the empirical formula of (Et4N)2[Mn2L3]?

What is the space group of [Co(DMF)6][Co2L3]?
What method was used to calculate the void fraction and geometric surface area?
What force field was used to model the N2 and CO2 molecules in the simulations?
Is the crystal system of (Et4N)2[Mn2L3] trigonal?
Does the experimental PXRD pattern of 1 match with its simulated PXRD pattern?
Was the Lennard-Jones potential used to compute interactions between non-bonded atoms in the framework model?
Is the color change from dark brown to purple upon partial metal exchange indicative of phase purity in 3a?
Was the Grand Canonical Monte Carlo method used for simulating N2 and CO2 isotherms?
What is the ratio of chlorine to metal in (Et4N)2[Co2L3] according to EDX spectra?
What is the final R index for [Zn(DMF)6][Zn2L3]?
Was the EQeq method used to calculate partial charges of the framework atoms?
Did the reaction to produce [Co(DMF)6][Co2L3] from (Et4N)2[Mn2L3] typically require 2-4 weeks to reach completion?
What was the approximate yield estimated for the reaction producing (Et4N)2[Co2L3] from [Co(DMF)6][Co2L3]?
Is the crystal system of [Zn(DMF)6][Zn2L3] trigonal?
What was the method used for indexing and unit cell refinement for partially desolvated (Et4N)2[Mn2L3]?
data.answer: Werner algorism under the index and refine program (INDEX)

data.question: Was the presence of both [Zn(DMF)6][Zn2L3] and [Zn(DMF)6][Mn2L3] lattices in a single crystal of 3a confirmed by diffraction images?
